1.Title: Suzy Shier Polar Fleece Dotted Pajama Pants
1.description: Who doesn't love getting cuddly? It's now that much easier in these soft and cozy polar fleece pajama pants in a cute dotted print.

2.Title: Suzy Shier Polar Fleece Star Print Pajama Pants
2.description: Who doesn't love getting cuddly? It's now that much easier in these soft and cozy polar fleece pajama pants in a dreamy star print.

3.Title: Suzy Shier Polar Fleece Dandelion Print Pajama Pants
3.description: Who doesn't love getting cuddly? It's now that much easier in these soft and cozy polar fleece pajama pants in a sweet dandelion print.

4.Title: Suzy Shier Printed Sleeveless Dress with Back Zip
4.description: Get a more striking look by trading in your soft florals for the bold, jungle print on this sexy, back zipped, sleeveless dress.

5.Title: Suzy Shier Lined High Low Lace Dress with Adjustable Straps
5.description: Make an exquisite entrance in delicate lace when you wear this impressive high low dress, and get the perfect fit with the convenient adjustable spaghetti straps.

6.Title: Suzy Shier Sweater Knit Patchwork Dress
6.description: Stray from the everyday and flaunt a style everyone will want with this striking patchwork dress in a comfy sweater knit.

7.Title: Suzy Shier Printed Drop Shoulder Top with Shirt Tail Hem
7.description: Keep it subtle yet stylish with the chic, understated print and trendy shirt tail hem on this comfy knit top.

8.Title: Suzy Shier Printed Scoop Neck Dress with Pockets and Scarf Detail
8.description: You'll be a vision with no effort at all when you flaunt this chic printed dress, featuring front patch pockets, large buttons and a stylish scarf accessory detail.

9.Title: Suzy Shier Floral Hi Low V-neck Top
9.description: Add a touch of elegance to any look with the classy floral print on this v-neck top, featuring a hi low hem with a shirt tail and roll-up sleeves.

10.Title: Suzy Shier Printed Scuba Midi Dress with Side Ruching
10.description: Everything about this faux wrap dress screams flattering; from the bold, romantic print to the waist hugging side ruching and drawstring detail.

11.Title: Suzy Shier Cowl Neck Dress with Side Buttons and Kangaroo Pockets
11.description: You'll love going out for no reason at all when you can flaunt this adorable, short-sleeved cowl neck dress, with a flattering empire waist, cool, front kangaroo pockets and trendy side tab and button details.

12.Title: Suzy Shier Double Layer Asymmetrical Color Block Top
12.description: Contrasting the bold color block print with solid sleeves makes this asymmetrical top pop.

13.Title: Suzy Shier Abstract Print Dolman Top with Tassel Trim
13.description: You'll be a walking work of art in this cool, abstract printed dolman top with a touch of tassel trim at the sleeves and hem just for fun.

14.Title: Suzy Shier Flute Sleeved Lace Top with Hi Low Hem
14.description: Romantic lace combines with a trendy hi low hem and flute sleeves to form a flirty blouse you'll love to flaunt this summer.

15.Title: Suzy Shier Floral Blouse with Crochet Detailing and Elastic Hem
15.description: The delicate crochet trim complements the soft floral print on this blouse to give you a sweet look for any occasion.

16.Title: Suzy Shier Flutter Sleeved Top with Hi Low Hem
16.description: Everything about this top is fun, from its flirty flutter sleeves to its trendy hi low hem.

17.Title: Suzy Shier Sleeveless Maxi Dress with Drawstring Waist
17.description: Looking stylish is a cinch with this trendy maxi dress, featuring front and back keyholes and a cinched, drawstring waist with tassels.

18.Title: Suzy Shier Floral Front Tie Blouse with Kimono Sleeves
18.description: This adorable floral blouse ties in the front and has chic kimono sleeves, making it ideal over your favorite maxi dress or to pair with a cami and jeans.

19.Title: Suzy Shier Hi Low Tunic Dress with Crochet Collar and Ruffles
19.description: Everyone needs a comfortable yet stylish day dress, and this design, with its trendy crochet collar, hi low hem and ruffle and tassel detailing is an effortless choice on its own or with skinnies.

20.Title: Suzy Shier Printed Maxi Dress with Crossover Top and Flutter Sleeves
20.description: Everything about this maxi dress screams style; from the flattering crossover top and flutter elbow sleeves to the 2 flirty center slits.

21.Title: Suzy Shier Ruched V-neck Maxi Dress with Back Tie
21.description: With this striking, printed maxi dress you get flattering front ruching and a trendy self back tie for an effortless summer look.

22.Title: Suzy Shier Elastic Waist Skirt with Printed Lace Overlay
22.description: This sweet skirt has a comfy wide elastic waistband and back zip, but it will also give you a romantically feminine vibe every time you twirl, with its flirty printed lace overlay.

23.Title: Suzy Shier Striped Straight Leg Pants
23.description: The flattering, lengthening effect of the stripes on these pull-on pants make them a go-to summer staple.

24.Title: Suzy Shier Floral A-line Top with Ruffled Asymmetrical Hem
24.description: This sweet, floral top has all the right touches; from its flattering a-line cut to the trendy ruffling and trim on its asymmetrical hem.

25.Title: Suzy Shier Floral Burnout Dolman Top with Cami
25.description: Summer elegance begins with this classy burnout top in a subtle floral pattern, featuring elastic sleeves and hem and a convenient inner cami.

26.Title: Suzy Shier Elephant Print Popover Top
26.description: Trade in your florals for something a little more exotic with the elephant print on this chic popover top with tacked cuffs.

27.Title: Suzy Shier Striped Sashed Off Shoulder Jumpsuit
27.description: Sexy jumpsuits are all the rage this summer, so flaunt the trend in this striped, off shoulder design, with flared legs and a sash.
